_header: A man that hath little to doon
Note: For a version in 7-line stanzas and early prints, see 2557.

PierpontM876.First Lines:
[A] man that hath litel to dooneWerk he may make him
                    soone…
PierpontM876.Last Lines: …Eternallie there to beSeith Amen al for charitie
PierpontM876.Attributed Title:
[H]Ere begynneth a royal historie of the excellent knight Generides king
                    Aufrens son king of Ynde… (f. 103); beginning of ‘Here endeth’
                    on f. 152va, but rest destroyed
PierpontM876.Editions:
Furnivall,  Frederick James,
                        ed.  
             A Royal Historie of the Excellent Knight Generides.
Roxburghe Club
         85. Hertford: S. Austin, 1865.
